item.description:
Come and join me to practice Qigong next Saturday, Oct 30, from 1:00 - 2:30pm. I'll give a brief introduction to Qigong and then we'll do practices that allow us to remove negative energy from the body, calm the heart, quiet the mind and absorb energy from the universe.

If you haven't attended one of our Meetups yet, I'd love to meet you and if you've practiced with us before, welcome back!

Dee
item.how_to_find_us: Go up the stairs to the 2nd floor, turn left and left again and head straight to the glassed-in room with the windows.
item.name: October Qigong Meetup - Reduce your stress and increase your energy level!
